Description:
Detects possible addition of shadow credentials to an active directory object.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), Elastic (idea)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Possible Shadow Credentials Added
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '5136' and attributeldapdisplayname = 'msds-keycredentiallink'
